tax_rules.eu_licensed: All gambling winnings are taxable income in the US

legal_framework.player_responsibility: Online gambling legality varies by state. Check your local laws.

ui_labels.sources_intro: This article is based on information from the following authoritative sources:
ui_labels.disclaimer_text: Gambling is only permitted for persons aged 21 and over in most states. Gamble responsibly and set limits.
ui_labels.disclaimer_full: Gambling is only permitted for persons aged 21 and over in most states. Gamble responsibly and set limits. If you feel your gambling is becoming problematic, contact the National Problem Gambling Helpline at 1-800-522-4700.
